title: League Cilent Broken (NEED HELP)
body:
Currently having issues with the league cilent. Everytime i open the cilent it either displays one of the four down below. I've been trying to fix it for awhile such as going directly into the RADS folder and deleting a few things. Changing internet connection, Reinstall 10 times still doesnt work. Im just stuck right now and it would be greatly appreciated if anyone could help



-Runs in background on task mannager but doesnt display anything in the taskbar
-(Failed to load URL "https://riot:-_zWsEfdoMIZ8edOkd7qBw@127.0.0.1:52497/index.html" with error "unknown error code -126" (-126) with a white background
-Green league cilent box just empty
-League cilent shows animation and home cilent but authenicates forever and scans on 0%.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Processor Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz
Video Card NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
OS Microsoft Windows 10 (build 14393), 64-bit
Motherboard ASUS H270 Pro
Corsair DDR4 8+8GB
2TB Barracuda HDD
1TB Western Digital HDD
250GB Samsung SSD
XTREME GAMING SWEATBAND (Key For Optimal Gaming)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.body: This issue is likely caused by a network issue failing to download assets.  Changing your internet connection is a step on the right track, but I suggest going over each instruction in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if that helps!

Thanks for the help. It didnt exactly work but while looking at the firewall i've found that my antivirus (Norton) was blocking "rads_users_kernel.exe".
Still havent found how to unblock it but I'll try to find out the solution. 

Thanks so much!!!
Sincerely Panda :3
